div.span: Good Afternoon Parents & Friends of Marblehead Community Charter Public School,

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: We continue to follow the fast-developing information regarding the Coronavirus/COVID-19 and the possible impacts to our communities and schools. Please note that as this situation is rapidly evolving, we may send out other information on short-notice regarding possible impacts on our school.

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: We will keep the school open until there is an elevated concern within our community or receive guidance from public health officials. We are monitoring the situation closely and will update the community as the situation evolves. Once again, these events are changing by the hour and we are monitoring things closely.

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: We want to provide you with up-to-date information. You can help us do that by:

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: Making sure we have your most recent contact information (email, phone). If it has changed recently, contact the school via email (Katherine Koch:

li.span: ) to update it.

li.span: Checking your email and the MCCPS website (

li.span: ) daily for updates.

li.span: If your child is experiencing any health-related symptoms, please err on the side of caution and keep your child home from school. These will be recorded as excused absences.

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: Please

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

li.span: notify the school

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: if your child will be out and share the symptoms with us, so that we may track this information.

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: While we have prided ourselves on being a school that welcomes

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

li.span: parent visitations

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: at breakfast for community meeting and at lunch, we are respectfully requesting that you limit your visits to our school so that our learning environment is more contained in the short term to faculty, staff, and students. We appreciate your cooperation with this request.

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;
font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: Staff/Faculty members have all been instructed to stay home if they have any flu-like symptoms. While they will utilize their allotted sick days, they will not be penalized for going over their number of days out during the month of March.

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: The facilities department and cleaning crew have increased the frequency of sanitizing the school’s door handles, sink handles, toilets, tables and desktops.

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: We have provided classrooms with hand sanitizer and disinfectant wipes so that informal cleaning can take place throughout each day.

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: We have urged students and staff to discontinue hugs, handshakes, and high-fives. While we are a tight-knit community, we will avoid these interactions.

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-weight: bold;

div.span: HOPE FOR THE BEST, PLAN FOR THE WORST

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;
font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-weight: bold; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: Friday March 13 is an early release day

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: . The faculty will spend the afternoon putting in place plans for learning should we be mandated to close the school for an extended period of time.

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: One component of a learning plan if the school will be closed for an extended period of time will include digital (distance) learning via our Google Classroom platform. If you do not have access to a computer/laptop/tablet or wifi, we will work with you to access any lessons/activities we ask students to complete. Please let us know if you do not have this access. Contact Matt Cronin mcronin@marbleheadcharter.com

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: Reading is the best thing that students can do. Every student should be reading for 30 minutes per day every day, not just during this health scare.

span.style: font-size: 15px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif;

li.span: The school is currently assessing possible changes/cancelations to upcoming field trips including the 8th grade trip to Washington, DC, the 6th grade trip to Nature’s Classroom, and the 4th grade field trip to the Peabody Essex Museum. We will share decisions on these trips as soon as possible.
